FO - Fine
Fined £200.00
FIDICI - Fined and detained in default of payment until court rises
To be detained in the courthouse until the court rises. Total amount enforced £199.00. Reason for decision: fidici 2.
PDATE - Pay by date
Pay by date. Date to pay in full by: 10/10/2025.
